content.p: Join us in our thriving research community exploring world-changing issues at the forefront of science and healthcare. You will develop skills prized by academia and biotechnology, healthcare and pharmaceutical industries, to assist you in achieving your career goals. We offer a mixture of research-focused three and four year PhD programmes, supported by taught courses that will broaden your scientific knowledge and give you high-quality training in basic, strategic and applied aspects of research. Students explore a diverse and fascinating range of subjects and thereâ€™s every opportunity to tailor your studies and focus on areas of interest. Explore our postgraduate community We have a number of vacancies available. Some funded projects are only available to UK or EU/International students. If you have your own funding secured, via sponsorship or an employer for instance, you may also apply for projects or direct to the school. UK funded vacancies International and self-funded EU-UK student vacancies Funded projects are available by joining our Centre for Doctoral Training in Transformative Pharmaceutical Technologies. We welcome applicants from a broad range of disciplines, offering you a world of opportunities to work with acclaimed scientists and develop exceptional skills. Most PhD students begin their programme in late September or early February. For all enquiries please visit: www.nottingham.ac.uk/enquiry
